title: The toxicity in OCE is disgusting is Riot even doing anything?
body: We need a proper tribunal, the toxicity, trolls, etc is unbelievable in ranked. Do reports even do anything?

replies.body: I'm the only tribunal we need.
well if you say so.

I do statistics for a living and it is way more then 1% being toxic, you also have the smurfs coming to bronze and trolling. If you think it is not an issue then you are not looking too hard at the game.
Get to a level where matches take teamwork to win and not just 1 person stomping their lane opponent and solo carrying the game then you'll enjoy majority of games toxic and troll free.

Oce probably is the most toxic server ever. I've played on other servers as well and yes they do have toxics just like oce. but the amount of trolls and toxic players in Oce is probably like..3-4x more than other servers. People go afk for weird reasons such as picking champions they dont like, 10 cs behind or been killed for first blood.
Maybe check out the French for a bit.

I decided to go back into ranked, most toxicity I've ever seen playing this game. Had a Morgana go AFK because Graves was 11 CS behind.

Stick to normals, arguments rarely happen and the game can actually be enjoyed. If you lose because of an AFKer or troll, your LP and MMR don't get punished.

To me dealing with toxic players is a lot like listening to those 12 y/o's on COD talking %%%%.
I can't take them seriously - but they're %%%%ing distasteful to deal with.

But honestly i think all we need is a proper working tribunal. TBH the OLD tribunal changed me from a toxic/negative player to a stable and calm player because i knew the bans would come if i didn't shape my attitude.

> This is always an interesting discussion to have especially because less than 1% of players are persistently negative enough to trigger a major punishment such as a 14-day ban or permanent ban. The toxicity you see is usually a player that 90% of the time is neutral - positive in their behaviour BUT they have that **one** bad day. Sometimes this is compounded because multiple players have that **one** bad game/day in the same game.
